{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3345696,"name":"ori","username":"revthunder","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/r/2bfe46/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-03-27T21:24:21.037Z","cooked":"

After our competition we looked at our logs, We found out we are not able to detect April tags if our velocity is higher than .5 m/s.
We are using arducam ov9782(color sensor) and have tried lowering the exposure till it almost can’t detect
With a resulotion of 1280x720
Low decsion margin of 40
And decimate 2
Our cameras are places on the swerve protectors they don’t shake will moving
Running on a beelink with 30 fps
Any tips to try?
